db:abstract.db:para: Contains classes that are the foundation for Qt 3D simulation framework, as well as classes that provide the ability to render using the Qt 3D framework.

db:section.db:title: class QAbstractAspect
db:section.db:para: QAbstractAspect is the base class for aspects that provide a vertical slice of behavior.

db:section.db:title: class QAspectEngine
db:section.db:para: Responsible for handling all the QAbstractAspect subclasses that have been registered with the scene.

db:section.db:title: class QAspectJob
db:section.db:para: The base class for jobs executed in an aspect.

db:section.db:title: class QBackendNode
db:section.db:para: The base class for all Qt3D backend nodes.

db:section.db:title: class QBackendNodeMapper
db:section.db:para: Creates and maps backend nodes to their respective frontend nodes.

db:section.db:title: class QComponent
db:section.db:para: The base class of scene nodes that can be aggregated by Qt3DCore::QEntity instances as a component.

db:section.db:title: class QComponentAddedChange
db:section.db:para: The QComponentAddedChange class is used to notify when a component is added to an entity.

db:section.db:title: class QComponentRemovedChange
db:section.db:para: The QComponentRemovedChange class is used to notify when a component is removed from an entity.

db:section.db:title: class QDynamicPropertyUpdatedChange
db:section.db:para: The QDynamicPropertyUpdatedChange class is used to notify when a dynamic property value is updated.

db:section.db:title: class QEntity
db:section.db:para: Qt3DCore::QEntity is a Qt3DCore::QNode subclass that can aggregate several Qt3DCore::QComponent instances that will specify its behavior.

db:section.db:title: class QNode
db:section.db:para: QNode is the base class of all Qt3D node classes used to build a Qt3D scene.

db:section.db:title: class QNodeCreatedChange
db:section.db:para: Used to notify when a node is created.

db:section.db:title: class QNodeCreatedChangeBase
db:section.db:para: The QNodeCreatedChangeBase class is the base class for all NodeCreated QSceneChange events.

db:section.db:title: class QNodeDestroyedChange
db:section.db:para: Used to notify when a node is destroyed.

db:section.db:title: class QNodeId
db:section.db:para: Uniquely identifies a QNode.

db:section.db:title: class QPropertyNodeAddedChange
db:section.db:para: Used to notify when a node is added to a property.

db:section.db:title: class QPropertyNodeRemovedChange
db:section.db:para: The QPropertyNodeRemovedChange class is used to notify when a node is removed from a property.

db:section.db:title: class QPropertyUpdatedChange
db:section.db:para: The QPropertyUpdatedChange class is used to notify when a property value is updated.

db:section.db:title: class QPropertyUpdatedChangeBase
db:section.db:para: The QPropertyUpdatedChangeBase class is the base class for all PropertyUpdated QSceneChange events.

db:section.db:title: class QPropertyValueAddedChange
db:section.db:para: Used to notify when a value is added to a property.

db:section.db:title: class QPropertyValueAddedChangeBase
db:section.db:para: The QPropertyValueAddedChangeBase class is the base class for all PropertyValueAdded QSceneChange events.

db:section.db:title: class QPropertyValueRemovedChange
db:section.db:para: Used to notify when a value is added to a property.

db:section.db:title: class QPropertyValueRemovedChangeBase
db:section.db:para: The QPropertyValueRemovedChangeBase class is the base class for all PropertyValueRemoved QSceneChange events.

db:section.db:title: class QSceneChange
db:section.db:para: The base class for changes that can be sent and received by Qt3D's change notification system.

db:section.db:title: class QStaticPropertyUpdatedChangeBase
db:section.db:para: The QStaticPropertyUpdatedChangeBase class is the base class for all static PropertyUpdated QSceneChange events.

db:section.db:title: class QStaticPropertyValueAddedChangeBase
db:section.db:para: The QStaticPropertyValueAddedChangeBase class is the base class for all static PropertyValueAdded QSceneChange events.

db:section.db:title: class QStaticPropertyValueRemovedChangeBase
db:section.db:para: The QStaticPropertyValueRemovedChangeBase class is the base class for all static PropertyValueRemoved QSceneChange events.

db:section.db:title: class QTransform
db:section.db:para: Used to perform transforms on meshes.

db:section.db:title: enum ChangeFlag
db:section.db:para: The types of change that can be sent and received by Qt3D's change notification system.

db:td.db:para: A new instance of a QNode subclass has been created.
A QNode property has been updated.
A QNode has been added to the scene.
A QNode has been removed from the scene.
A QComponent has been added to a QEntity.
A QComponent has been removed from a QEntity.
Allows an observer to monitor for any of the above changes.

db:section.db:para: The ChangeFlags type is a typedef for QFlags<ChangeFlag>. It stores an OR combination of ChangeFlag values.

db:section.db:title: QAspectJobPtr
db:section.db:para: A shared pointer for QAspectJob.

db:section.db:title: QBackendNodeMapperPtr
db:section.db:para: A shared pointer for QBackendNodeMapper.

db:section.db:title: QComponentAddedChangePtr
db:section.db:para: A shared pointer for QComponentAddedChange.

db:section.db:title: QComponentRemovedChangePtr
db:section.db:para: A shared pointer for QComponentRemovedChange.

db:section.db:title: QComponentVector
db:section.db:para: List of QComponent pointers.

db:section.db:title: QDynamicPropertyUpdatedChangePtr
db:section.db:para: A shared pointer for QDynamicPropertyUpdatedChange.

db:section.db:title: QEntityPtr
db:section.db:para: A shared pointer for QEntity.

db:section.db:title: QNodeCreatedChangeBasePtr
db:section.db:para: A shared pointer for QNodeCreatedChangeBase.

db:section.db:title: QNodeDestroyedChangePtr
db:section.db:para: A shared pointer for QNodeDestroyedChange.

db:section.db:title: QNodeIdVector
db:section.db:para: A vector of {QNodeId}s.

db:section.db:title: QNodePtr
db:section.db:para: A shared pointer for QNode.

db:section.db:title: QNodeVector
db:section.db:para: List of QNode pointers.

db:section.db:title: QPropertyNodeAddedChangePtr
db:section.db:para: A shared pointer for QPropertyNodeAddedChange.

db:section.db:title: QPropertyNodeRemovedChangePtr
db:section.db:para: A shared pointer for QPropertyNodeRemovedChange.

db:section.db:title: QPropertyUpdatedChangeBasePtr
db:section.db:para: A shared pointer for QPropertyUpdatedChangeBase.

db:section.db:title: QPropertyUpdatedChangePtr
db:section.db:para: A shared pointer for QPropertyUpdatedChange.

db:section.db:title: QPropertyValueAddedChangeBasePtr
db:section.db:para: A shared pointer for QPropertyValueAddedChangeBase.

db:section.db:title: QPropertyValueAddedChangePtr
db:section.db:para: A shared pointer for QPropertyValueAddedChange.

db:section.db:title: QPropertyValueRemovedChangeBasePtr
db:section.db:para: A shared pointer for QPropertyValueRemovedChangeBase.

db:section.db:title: QPropertyValueRemovedChangePtr
db:section.db:para: A shared pointer for QPropertyValueRemovedChange.

db:section.db:title: QSceneChangePtr
db:section.db:para: A shared pointer for QSceneChange.

db:section.db:title: QStaticPropertyUpdatedChangeBasePtr
db:section.db:para: A shared pointer for QStaticPropertyUpdatedChangeBase.

db:section.db:title: [noexcept] uint qHash(Qt3DCore::QNodeId id, uint seed = 0)
db:section.db:para: Returns hash of node with id and optional seed.

db:section.db:title: Qt3DCore::QNodeId qIdForNode(Qt3DCore::QNode *node)
db:section.db:para: Returns node id for node.

db:section.db:title: QDebug Qt3DCore::operator<<(QDebug d, Qt3DCore::QNodeId id)
db:section.db:para: << with d and id. Returns QDebug.
